sentences.en: Davis went to regain his carriage.
sentences.cn: 戴维斯回到他的马车上。

sentences.en: Government forces have regained control of the city.
sentences.cn: 政府军已重新控制了这座城市。

sentences.en: He looked stunned, but he soon regain ed his composure (= became calm again ) .
sentences.cn: 他似乎愣了愣，但很快就恢复平静了。

sentences.en: He somehow managed to regain his balance .
sentences.cn: 他总算恢复了平衡。

sentences.en: I struggled to regain some dignity.
sentences.cn: 我努力恢复自己的一点儿尊严。

sentences.en: I'll have to take stock, go carefully and regain my buoyancy.
sentences.cn: 我将不得不审时度势，小心行事，同时保持乐观。

sentences.en: It took him a while to regain his composure.
sentences.cn: 他过了一会儿才恢复镇定。

sentences.en: Shall we regain the shore alive?
sentences.cn: 我们能活着回到岸上 吗 ?

sentences.en: She needs to regain a sense of her own worth.
sentences.cn: 她需要重新认识到自我的价值。

sentences.en: She's petitioning to regain custody of the child.
sentences.cn: 她请求重获孩子的监护权。

sentences.en: Sofia and Alex came to a halt and both tried to regain their breath.
sentences.cn: 索菲娅和亚历克斯停了下来，两人都想喘口气。

sentences.en: Stopping only briefly to regain her composure, she described her agonising ordeal.
sentences.cn: 她只停顿了一小会儿让自己恢复平静，然后讲述了她无比痛苦的经历。

sentences.en: The doctors don’t know if he will ever regain the use of his legs.
sentences.cn: 医生们不知道他的腿是否还能恢复功能。

sentences.en: The family never quite regained its former influence.
sentences.cn: 这个家族再也没有恢复往昔的影响力。

sentences.en: The fighter believes he can still regain some of his old magic.
sentences.cn: 这位斗士相信自己仍然可以恢复从前的一些魔力。

sentences.en: The President must seek to regain the high ground in the political debate.
sentences.cn: 总统必须设法在这场政治辩论中重新获得优势。

sentences.en: The Russians had to dive-bomb the cities to regain control.
sentences.cn: 俄国人必须俯冲轰炸那些城市才能重新获得控制权。

sentences.en: To cast it off might be to regain serenity.
sentences.cn: 把它抛开,可以使心神重归平静.

sentences.en: When she regained consciousness (= woke up after being unconscious ) , she was lying on the floor.
sentences.cn: 她恢复知觉醒来时，正躺在地板上。

sentences.en: When will she regain consciousness?
sentences.cn: 她什么时候会恢复知觉?

sentences.en: You can regain the main road by turning left two miles ahead.
sentences.cn: 你在前面两英里处左转,既可回到公路干线.

trans.tran_en: to get something back, especially an ability or quality, that you have lost

trans.tran_cn: 复得，重回，回收，恢复（失物、失地、健康等）
